JsonSchemaFile.description: The JSON Schema File resource describes the location (URI) of a particular Redfish schema definition being implemented or referenced by a Redfish service.
JsonSchemaFile.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent the Schema File locator resource for a Redfish implementation.

title: #JsonSchemaFile.JsonSchemaFile
